Text:
dah dah dah dan doh, dan dan dan do.

Really?


I grew up in Hawaii and watched the original every week.

Is this shit serious?  I have to watch this!

Next thing you know, there'll be a Magnum PI redux, as well.

Though, honestly, H50 is more realistic.  That is the early 70's shit I remember.

GI's and locals always got into fights in Honolulu.  There was often knife fights.

But all of us military brats were educated by japanese, philipino, somoan, chinese and korean teachers.

Hawaii is the only true melting pot.  Conus America only imagines that it is a melting pot.

Heh! Guys. Don't miss this show.
It is  good. Plenty of action.
